content: this extremely dramatic and elegant shawl makes an especially nice gift its very generous size of 80 by 40 makes it suitable for all body sizes or a masterpiece such as this looks absolutely lovely hanging over a frame as shown above using it as home decor rather than a clothing accessory filet crochet produces exceptionally nice projects but unfortunately photography is difficult due to its nature please excuse the lack of more professional photography at this time these photos will be replaced as soon as weather permits as outdoor photography is always best if you have never worked a filet crochet project you will be happy to know that it uses only double_crochet and chain stitches to create the image this makes it very quick and easy the shawl shown took approximately 30 hours for completion for those unfamiliar with filet crochet a beginner tutorial is included with the pattern note reformatted and republished mar 2015
